title: Demaryius Thomas, Former Denver Broncos Player, Dead at 33
sub_head: The wide receiver retired in June after a decade in the NFL
body:
Former star wide receiver Demaryius Thomas, who spent 10 seasons in the National Football League, was found dead Thursday in his Georgia home. He was 33.
A medical factor contributed to Mr. Thomasâ€™s death, according to a Roswell, Ga., police department spokesman. The exact cause of death will be determined by the Fulton County Medical Examiner following an autopsy.
